attributes.action: Reduce the Lottery funding for the 2012 Games by :-
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount equivalent to the Income Tax that they are NOT collecting from the Monaco Millionaires. This alone amounts to hundreds of millions of pounds. TAX THEM --- NOT GRAB LOTTERY MONEY ! Why take it from the Lottery ? Take it from the Monaco Millionaires by a simple piece of legislation !
